name: S-adenosyl-L-methionine:methylcob(III)alamin:gentamicin-X2 methyltransferase
definition: Gentamicin X2 + Methylcobalamin + S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + H+ + e- <=> Antibiotic G-418 + Cob(II)alamin + 5'-Deoxyadenosine + L-Methionine
